com.meta64.mobile.util

Class JcrUtil

  • Object
    • JcrUtil

  • @Component
public class JcrUtil
extends Object
    Assorted general utility functions related to JCR nodes.

    todo-1: there's a lot of code calling these static methods, but need to transition to singleton scope bean and non-static methods.
